articles.title: Memorial Day weekend box office could be first to top $100 million since the pandemic began - CNBC
articles.description: This Memorial Day weekend could break the $100 million mark at the box office.
articles.content:
This Memorial Day weekend could have the right combination of new movie releases, number of cinemas open and increased consumer confidence to break the $100 million mark at the box office.
